sentences.en: Also, in traditional black forest cakes, kirsch, which is a clear colorless fruit brandy which is made from double distillation of morellos is added.
sentences.cn: 此外，传统的黑森林蛋糕中还会加入樱桃酒，这是一种清澈无色的水果白兰地，由欧洲酸樱桃经两次蒸馏后制成。

sentences.en: Any faults in the original cider stood out sharply after distillation.
sentences.cn: 原先苹果酒里的任何杂质在蒸馏后都会凸现出来。

sentences.en: Art is the distillation of life.
sentences.cn: 艺术是现实生活的升华.

sentences.en: But distillation does not produce enough high grade petrol to meet today's high demand.
sentences.cn: 但是,蒸馏不能产生出足够的优质汽油来满足今天的大量需要.

sentences.en: Coal - gas, obtained from the distillation of coal is mainly a mixture of hydrogen and methane.
sentences.cn: 煤经蒸馏以后所得到的煤气主要是氢气和甲烷的混合物.

sentences.en: Distillation has traditionally been the major system for water purification.
sentences.cn: 蒸馏法已传统地成了水提纯的主要方法.

sentences.en: During the course of the TBP distillation, the distillates which accumulate between specified temperatures are withdrawn.
sentences.cn: 在真沸点蒸馏过程中, 对规定温度范围内所收集的馏分可加以回收.

sentences.en: Every paragraph is a distillation of sound judgment.
sentences.cn: 每段话都是正确判断的结晶.

sentences.en: He tried to obtain another material by distillation.
sentences.cn: 他试图通过蒸馏法获得另一种物质。

sentences.en: In industrial processes, liquid mixtures are often separated into their pure components by distillation.
sentences.cn: 在工业过程中, 常用精馏作用把液体混合物分离为纯组分.

sentences.en: In the early work, separation of the products depended on distillation.
sentences.cn: 在早期的工作中, 产物是靠蒸馏分离.

sentences.en: It can be separated from each other by ordinary fractional distillation.
sentences.cn: 两者通过普通的分馏彼此分离.

sentences.en: Peat tar has similar properties to the tar derived from the destructive distillation of wood.
sentences.cn: 泥煤焦油的性质和由木材干馏所得到的焦油的性质相似.

sentences.en: Process distillation analysers may be classified under the following headings.
sentences.cn: 过程蒸馏分析仪可按以下标题分类.

sentences.en: The distillation column is provided with plates.
The material below is a distillation of his work.
sentences.cn: 下面的材料是他工作的摘要。

sentences.en: When carvone begins to distill, the condensation can be seen inside the thermometer adapter, thus the progress of carvone distillation can be readily monitored.
sentences.cn: 当香芹酮开始蒸馏时，在温度计转接器内可看到有冷凝，因此能够容易地监察香芹酮的蒸馏过程。

words.tran_cn: 蒸馏；蒸馏物；蒸馏法；精华（等于distilment或者distillation）
蒸馏；滴下；作为精华产生（等于distil）
蒸馏；提取…的精华；使渗出
蒸馏，净化；[化工]蒸馏法；精华，蒸馏物

trans.tran_cn: （各种释义的）蒸馏（过程），蒸馏物，蒸流，升华
